testcase.name: #deleteChore > When the list is not empty > When the chore exists > Delete the chore
#filterChores > When the filter is COMPLETED > When the list is empty > Return an empty list
#toggleChore > When the deadline is invalid > When the status is uncompleted > Toggle the chore
#loadChores > When no chores are loaded > Update the chore list
#addChore > When adding a chore > When the chore already exists > Throw an exception
#toggleChore > When the deadline is invalid > When status is completed > Throw an exception
#toggleChore > When the chore does not exist > Throw an exception
#toggleChore > When the deadline is valid > Toggle the chore
#addChore > When the deadline is invalid > Throw an exception
#addChore > When the description is invalid > Throw an exception
#filterChores > When the filter is ALL > When the list is empty > Return all chores
#deleteChore > When the list is not empty > When the chore does not exist > Throw an exception
#addChore > When the chore's list has at least one element > When adding a new chore > Add the chore
#loadChores > When the chores are loaded > Update the chore list
#filterChores > When the filter is ALL > When the list is not empty > Return all chores
#filterChores > When the filter is UNCOMPLETED > When the list is not empty > Return the filtered chores
#addChore > When the chore's list is empty > When adding a new chore > Add the chore
#filterChores > When the filter is UNCOMPLETED > When the list is empty > Return an empty list
#toggleChore > When the deadline is valid > When toggle the chore twice > Toggle chore
#filterChores > When the filter is COMPLETED > When the list is not empty > Return the filtered chores
#deleteChore > When the list is empty > Throw an exception
